1:
I was glad when they said to me,
\q "Let us go to the house of Yahweh."
\q
2:
Jerusalem, our feet are standing
\q within your gates!
\q
3:
Jerusalem, built
\q as a city carefully planned!
4:
The tribes go up to Jerusalem—the tribes of Yahweh—
\q as a testimony for Israel,
\q to give thanks to the name of Yahweh.
\q
5:
There thrones of judgment were set,
\q thrones of the house of David.
6:
Pray for the peace of Jerusalem!
\q "May those who love you have peace.
\q
7:
May there be peace within the walls that defend you,
\q and may they have peace within your fortresses."
8:
For the sake of my brothers and my friends
\q I will say, "May there be peace within you."
\q
9:
For the sake of the house of Yahweh our God,
\q I will seek good for you.
122:
\m
\d A song of ascents, of David.
\q
